roleset.name: cover with sequins
roleset.note: SEQUIN-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from sequin.01-v)

example.name: Syntactically interesting example, sequins as object
example.text: She sequined the words "I do, I do, I do," along the bottom of her veil herself.
example.arg: the words "I do, I do, I do,"
along the bottom of her veil

example.name: Passive, descriptive usage
example.text: You look at her, and [she]-1's sequined *-1 in stardust, as if she's been powdered with some magic mist.
example.arg: as if she's been powdered with some magic mist
